column1: What month of the year has 28 days?@All of them@What months don't have 28 days?
What is full of holes but still holds water?@A sponge@A cleaning device
What is harder to catch the faster you run?@Your breath@Something to do with your lungs
I am a vegetable that bugs stay away from. What am I?@Squash@Another word for juice
You're in a race and you pass the person in second place. What place are you in now?@Second place@Which position wins the silver medal?
What is at the end of the rainbow?@W@23rd position in the alphabet
What word is always spelled wrong?@Wrong@Opposite of right
What two words
column3: contain the most letters?@Post office@Where do you send letters?

column1: I am higher without a head. What am I?@A pillow@Where do you lay your head
I am wet when drying. What am I?@A towel@Might use it on the beach
The one who has it does not keep it. It is large and small. It is any shape.@A gift@Chirstmas is the season of giving what?
What has an eye but cannot see?@A needle@You might use this to fix you torn clothes
What can be lost
column2: but not returned?@Life@You're living it right now!

column1: I use my teeth but never to eat. What am I?@A comb@Your hair is messy!
What is full all day and empty all night?@Shoes@Take them off if they are muddy maybe!
If I lost my wings my name would change. What am I?@A fly@It must be named after what it does with it's wings
What has no beginning
column3: or middle?@A doughnut@A snack that famously doesn't have a middle

column1: What tastes better than it smells?@A tounge@Mmmmmm Tasty!
What is blue and smells like red paint?@Blue paint@All paint smells the same doesn't it?
What can run but cannot walk?@Water@Sometimes you can have it sparkling!
